post.body: What did ESPN do to put them in the same ranks as Google, Amazon, and Microsoft? http://bit.ly/o3kz
Don't let those spammers get you down! I have to fight through 10/week. Keeps @nickfooter in the lead for Twitter domination ;)
With all the information on writing resumes, and the need in a down economy, it would be easy. Guess you need to write a post
does that mean you wont be calling him back? Was the resume at least creative?
Do you think college sports would be as big? College GameDay & ESPNU.
Seriously, if you think about how dynamic ESPN is it's amazing. Talk about a great brand. They made the Spelling Bee relevant!
haha thanks for the follow and connecting with me on linkedin. Its always nice to meet other young passionate SM followers
opps, wrong post! http://bit.ly/BdeJ you don't need the other one because you've got a sucessful blog yourself http://bit.ly/129EE
I'd be interested to hear, or see a comprised blog post, of others plans as juniors or interns for swaying their uppers
"If you build it they will come." Case studies, traffic statics, and the almighty "The Tweeple said so!"
Through following and engaging with the innovators and then using my voice and perspective to contribute
Frank, your efforts should be applauded. You've hit what I call the Home Run of social media engagement http://bit.ly/nHrt
No more proof needed for me. That's Crocs hard a work through ALL the conditions!
I'm excited to watch and learn from you guys too! It's an interesting company and target overall
SM has influencer's in niches. Crocs needs to interact with everyone while sending the message through influencing channels
X-Games & Dew Tour dude! Get Shawn White in on that! That's a tough market though. It's soooo sponsor heavy
what's the surfers take on crocs? How can you connect with them via Social Media? Are you even able to?
Ahh yes, very cool. I always think of the surfer community ala Quicksilver with those. The canvas slipper
great point. What croc are you? A low top or you like a little around the ankles?
see I would think you could do a huge viral campaign with celebrities. Could you imagine. Lebron dunking in Crocs? Thats HOT
How can you compete with a Nike, Adidas, Puma, ect? Or are you not and thus created your own niche?
so what is www.crocs.com doing to be an influencer in the social media world?
Hey you start slow. Marathon in '09, Hood to Coast in '10 :) Seriously it's one of the coolest experiences. I'm an adict
